original_content:
Beware of despairing about yourself; you are commanded to

put your trust in God, and not in yourself. "Trust in Him at all
times." (Ps. 63:8)
original_reflection_text: Beware of despairing about yourself; you are commanded to put your trust in God, and not in yourself. "Trust in Him at all times."
original_verse_text: My soul clings to you; your right hand upholds me.
prayer: Heavenly Father, we come before You with humble hearts, acknowledging that our strength and wisdom are insufficient. Help us to trust in You with all our hearts, and not to rely on our own understanding. Guide us on the paths You have prepared, that we may walk in Your ways and glorify Your name. May we cling to You as our ever-present help, for You alone are worthy of our complete trust. Amen.
reflection: Beware of despairing about yourself; you are commanded to put your trust in God, and not in yourself. “Trust in Him at all times.“
subject: Discover the Strength Within You
verse_text: My soul clings to you; your right hand upholds me.

original_content:
_"The prayer of a righteous man is powerful and effective."_

_ _(James 5:16)

PRAYER IS A RISING UP AND DRAWING NEAR TO GOD IN MIND

AND IN HEART, AND IN SPIRIT. (Alexander Whyte)
original_reflection_text: PRAYER IS A RISING UP AND DRAWING NEAR TO GOD IN MIND AND IN HEART, AND IN SPIRIT. (Alexander Whyte)
original_verse_text: The prayer of a righteous man is powerful and effective.
prayer: Heavenly Father, we come before You with humble hearts, recognizing our need for Your grace and mercy. As Your Word in James 5:16 reminds us, the prayer of a righteous person has great power in its effectiveness. Lord, we seek to draw near to Your throne of grace, as Hebrews 4:16 encourages us to do, that we may receive the help and strength we need in our times of weakness and struggle. Guide us to pray with sincerity and faith, trusting in Your unfailing love and compassion. Amen.
reflection: PRAYER IS A RISING UP AND DRAWING NEAR TO GOD IN MIND AND IN HEART, AND IN SPIRIT. (Alexander Whyte)
subject: Ascending to God in Prayer
verse_text: The prayer of a righteous man is powerful and effective.

original_content:
IT IS WRITTEN: _"WORSHIP THE LORD YOUR GOD,_

_AND SERVE HIM ONLY." _(Matthew. 4:10) NIV

THE INSTINCT TO WORSHIP IS HARDLY LESS STRONG

THAN THE INSTINCT TO EAT--DOROTHY THOMPSON

(MAY THE LORD BLESS YOU THIS DAY)
original_reflection_text: The instinct to worship is hardly less strong than the instinct to eat -- Dorothy Thompson (may the lord bless you this day)
original_verse_text: It is written: Worship the Lord your God, and serve him only.
prayer: Heavenly Father, we come before You with humble hearts, recognizing that You alone are worthy of our worship and devotion. As the Scriptures teach, we are to worship and serve only You, our Lord and God. May our lives be a testament to this truth, as we turn away from the temptations of the world and fix our eyes upon You, the source of all that is good and true. Guide us, Lord, to worship You in spirit and in truth, that we may bring glory to Your name. Amen.
reflection: The instinct to worship is hardly less strong than the instinct to eat. - Dorothy Thompson (may the Lord bless you this day).
subject: Worship Instinct as Strong as Hunger
verse_text: It is written: Worship the Lord your God, and serve him only.

original_reflection_text: Without the Way there is no going; Without the Truth there is no knowing; Without the Life there is no living. AND: Without Christ there is none of these
original_verse_text: Jesus says: "I am the way, and the truth, and the life."
prayer: Heavenly Father, we come before You, acknowledging that in Christ alone we find the Way, the Truth, and the Life. Apart from Him, we are lost, unable to truly know You or experience the fullness of life. We give thanks for Your great love and mercy, which have made us alive in Christ, even when we were dead in our sins. Lord, we humbly ask that You would guide us ever closer to the path of righteousness, that we may walk in the truth and live abundantly in the life You have graciously provided. Amen.
reflection: Without the Way, there is no going; without the Truth, there is no knowing; without the Life, there is no living. And: without Christ, there is none of these.
subject: The Way, the Truth, the Life
verse_text: Jesus says: “I am the way, and the truth, and the life.“

original_content:
_"Reckless words pierce like a sword, _

_but the tongue of the wise brings healing."_

_ _(Proverbs 12:18) NIV

THOUGHT: The Tongue is an important thing. The Bible mentions

it about 215 times (Prov. 18:21; 21:23, etc.) When we speak kind,

thoughtful and true words, there is happiness, when we speak mean,

untrue, angry or complaining words, there is trouble.

TODAY: Let us work on taming our tongues.
original_reflection_text: The Tongue is an important thing. The Bible mentions it about 215 times (Proverbs 18:21; 21:23, etc.) When we speak kind, thoughtful and true words, there is happiness, when we speak mean, untrue, angry or complaining words, there is trouble. TODAY: Let us work on taming our tongues.
original_verse_text: Reckless words pierce like a sword, but the tongue of the wise brings healing.
prayer: Heavenly Father, we come before You with humble hearts, recognizing the power of the tongue and the impact our words can have. Help us to be mindful of the words we speak, that they may be seasoned with grace and truth, bringing life and encouragement to those around us. May we use our tongues to honor You, build up others, and spread the message of Your love. Guide us, Lord, to tame our tongues and let our speech reflect the transformation You are working in our lives. Amen.
reflection: The Tongue is an important thing. The Bible mentions it about 215 times (Proverbs 18:21; 21:23, etc.) When we speak kind, thoughtful and true words, there is happiness, when we speak mean, untrue, angry or complaining words, there is trouble. TODAY: Let us work on taming our tongues.
subject: Taming the Powerful Tongue
verse_text: Reckless words pierce like a sword, but the tongue of the wise brings healing.
